data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Tineovertex Moriuti (Insecta: Lepidoptera: Tineidae), with descriptions of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Guo-Hua, Hirowatari, Toshiya, Wang, Min (2011): A revision of the genus Tineovertex Moriuti (Insecta: Lepidoptera: Tineidae), with descriptions of five new species. Zootaxa 2991: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202539
